snippet.title: Robotry! Gameplay Trailer Spring 2022
snippet.description:
Robotry! is coming out in fall 2022! Confirmed platforms: PC, Xbox, and Nintendo Switch!

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1461930/Robotry/

Wreak havoc in the physics-based world of Robotry! Walk, jump, kick, grab and throw by directly controlling each leg. Go from a glitching toddler to a somersaulting acrobat in the story mode, or tackle your friends in multiplayer versus modes.

https://twitter.com/lockpickle
